channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla CEO Musk says time he spends on DOGE will drop 'significantly' next month
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on his company's earnings call on Tuesday that he'll spend much less time with DOGE starting in May.

item.title: Boeing reports results before the bell. Here's what to expect
item.description: Boeing hasn't reported an annual profit since 2018.

item.title: Capital One beats on earnings, flexes momentum ahead of closing Discover deal
item.description: Shares of the credit card issuer rose around 3% in extended trading Tuesday.

item.title: Software giant SAP’s shares surge 10% after first-quarter profit beat
item.description: SAP announced Wednesday that its first-quarter operating profit had risen by 58% year-on-year to hit 2.5 billion euros ($2.9 billion).

item.title: Tesla reports 20% drop in auto revenue as first-quarter results miss Wall Street estimates
item.description: Tesla's first-quarter earnings report lands as investors reckon with a steep slide in the company's stock price.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
